name: wolfquest.org Forum Customization Tweaks
description: User-customizable tweaks for the WolfQuest community forum to bring it closer to the phpBB 3.0.X days.
additional_info:
Initial release:
- Circular avatar override. (Compatibility: phpBB 3.2.X. Disabled by default.)
- Online banner/indicator override.
- Background customization override. (Available in two flavours: classic gradient or customizable/replaceable background image. Disabled by default.)
- Classic span enforcement. (Always fixed-size post content and always fixed-white bold/italics/underline and most other custom BBcodes.)

Pick what you want to use! Edit out the hide tags to enable overrides.
Delete sections you don't want to use to remove overrides.
